# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Caches and logs
.cache
*.log

# OS generated files #
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# Environment files
.env
.venv/
env/
venv/
ENV/

# Database files
*.sql
*.db

# CSV files (if they are large or contain sensitive information)
*.csv
